markdown.markdown:
:::::::::::: grid ::: {.g-col-lg-2 .g-col-md-1 .g-col-sm-0 .g-col-0} ::: ::::::::: {.g-col-lg-8 .g-col-md-10 .g-col-sm-12 .g-col-12} ::: lead A curated list of spatial data sources & methods + applications to distributional analysis by [Geospatial Poverty Solutions](http://geopov/) [UNDER CONSTRUCTION]{style="color: red;"} ::: Quickly find, assess and learn how to access useful spatial indicators & data sources ```{r include=FALSE} # Function for creating drop down tables source("code/dropdown_links.R") # data catalog data_list <- read.csv("data/data_list.csv") # methods catalog methods_list <- read.csv("methods/methods_list.csv") ``` ```{r} #| echo: false #| eval: false # This chunk's sole purpose is to trigger Quarto's dependency detection library(leaflet) ``` ```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'} library(htmltools) div(class = "blocks-container dropdown_list", class = "dropdown_list", list( dropdown_links( output_dir = "data", title = "People", link_data = data_list[grepl("People", data_list$theme), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#3498db", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/4807/4807598.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "data", title = "Planet", link_data = data_list[grepl("Planet", data_list$theme), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#2ecc71", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/9985/9985721.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "data", title = "Prosperity", link_data = data_list[grepl("Prosperity", data_list$theme), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#e74c3c", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/10074/10074713.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "data", title = "Infrastructure", link_data = data_list[grepl("Infrastructure", data_list$theme), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#9b59b6", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/10074/10074713.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "data", title = "Digital", link_data = data_list[grepl("Digital", data_list$theme), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#f39c12", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/10074/10074713.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "data", title = "Boundaries", link_data = data_list[grepl("Boundaries", data_list$theme), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "grey", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/10074/10074713.png" ) ) ) ``` ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"} ### Data catalog ```{r} #| echo: false #| results: 'asis' library(DT) data_list <- read.csv("data/data_list.csv") DT::datatable( data_list, escape = FALSE, # Allow HTML in table cells options = list(pageLength = 10), filter = 'top', class = 'cell-border stripe' ) ``` ::: #### Geocoded GMD Harmonized household survey microdata with location information and spatial variables ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"} ### List of geocoded GMD surveys - Stata and R code to access, analyze and use the GMD data are provided under methods. | | | | | | |-------------|----------|-----------------|-------------------|--------------------| | **Country** | **Year** | **Survey name** | **Location type** | **Location level** | | | | | | | ::: #### Space2Stats [Space2Stats](https://worldbank.github.io/DECAT_Space2Stats) provide regularly requested geospatial aggregates at two scales: - Official World Bank boundaries at admin level 2 - H3 hexagons at level 6 (\~36km2) ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"} ### S2S catalog - R and Python code to access the S2S data are provided on the [Space2Stats](https://worldbank.github.io/DECAT_Space2Stats/readme.html#api) site. | | | |-----------|---------------| | **Theme** | **Name** | | People | Population | | People | Urbanization | | Climate | Heat and Cold | ::: ## Methods and code Methods and reproducible code to help you use spatial data for distributional analysis ```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'} methods_list <- read.csv("methods/methods_list.csv") div(class = "blocks-container dropdown_list", class = "dropdown_list", list( dropdown_links( output_dir = "methods", title = "Aggregate", link_data = methods_list[grepl("Aggregate", methods_list$type), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#3498db", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/9308/9308941.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "methods", title = "Merge", link_data = methods_list[grepl("Merge", methods_list$type), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#f39c12", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/9850/9850778.png" ), dropdown_links( output_dir = "methods", title = "Map", link_data = methods_list[grepl("Map", methods_list$type), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#9b59b6", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/854/854878.png" ) ) ) ``` ```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'} methods_list <- read.csv("methods/methods_list.csv") div(class = "blocks-container dropdown_list", class = "dropdown_list", list( dropdown_links( output_dir = "methods", title = "Analyze", link_data = methods_list[grepl("Analyze", methods_list$type), 2, drop = FALSE], outline_color = "#e74c3c", icon_path = "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/9850/9850778.png" ) ) ) ``` ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"} ### Methods catalog ```{r} #| echo: false #| results: 'asis' library(DT) methods_list <- read.csv("methods/methods_list.csv") DT::datatable( methods_list, escape = FALSE, # Allow HTML in table cells options = list(pageLength = 10), filter = 'top', class = 'cell-border stripe' ) ``` ::: ## Applications A curated & searchable list of spatial welfare analysis studies ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"} ### Studies ```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'} library(DT) applications <- data.frame(Title = c(""), Authors = c(""), Summary = c(""), Data = c(""), Method = c(""), Reproducibility = c("")) DT::datatable( applications, escape = FALSE, # Allow HTML in table cells options = list(pageLength = 10), filter = 'top', class = 'cell-border stripe' ) ``` ::: ## Contribute To suggest data or methods [open an issue on Github](link) and fill out the template or [contact us](mailto:bbrunckhorst@worldbank.org?subject=GeoPov%20data%20and%20methods%20repository). ::::::::: ::: {.g-col-lg-1 .g-col-md-1 .g-col-sm-0 .g-col-0} ::: :::::::::::: ```{=html}
  • Geospatial Poverty Solutions Home
  • Geospatial poverty portal
  • Contact us
```
